lead_paragraph: A group of former Nigerian militants said on Sunday it had lost confidence in the president's efforts to end attacks on oil facilities in the Niger Delta, a major goal in efforts to reach a lasting peace settlement.
snippet: A group of former Nigerian militants said on Sunday it had lost confidence in the president's efforts to end attacks on oil facilities in the Niger Delta, a major goal in efforts to reach a lasting peace settlement....

headline.main: Nigerian Ex-Militants Say Lost Confidence in Buhari Over Restive Delta
headline.print_headline: Nigerian Ex-Militants Say Lost Confidence in Buhari Over Restive Delta
